definition: fee paid to an author for a piece of writing
to entertain/to repay/to return/to reward/to compensate/to reply/to answer

sentences.english: Remuneration will be give to the writers within one month after the article is officially published.
sentences.chinese: 文章稿酬在稿件正式发布后一个月内发放。

sentences.english: If works of foreign authors are used, the remuneration may be slightly higher than that which would be paid to domestic authors.
sentences.chinese: 使用外国人的作品，可按略高于国内作者稿酬支付。

sentences.english: Those who selected no remuneration, gifts like a roll of the book.
sentences.chinese: 凡入选者无稿酬，赠送样书一卷。

sentences.english: I'll be using my payment from this column to do my little part.
sentences.chinese: 我会用本栏目的稿酬尽一点力。

definition: to submit articles for publication/to contribute (writing)
the author takes sole responsibility for the views expressed here (disclaimer)
to reward/to tip/to give a gratuity
piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
to settle a bill/to close an account
to set aside for/to keep as
